item.title: Protesters in Israel intensify pressure against plan to expand Gaza war
item.description: Meanwhile in Gaza, five people, including two children, died in the past 24 hours from malnutrition, the Hamas-run health ministry said.

item.title: Ukraine's European allies say peace talks must include Kyiv
item.description: The White House says Trump is open to Ukraine joining talks with Putin on Friday, as Zelensky insists any deal without Kyiv is a “dead decision”.

item.title: Watch: Masked thieves steal $7k of Labubu dolls in California
item.description: The LA County Sheriff's Department says it is investigating the incident.

item.title: Thousands protest in Israel over Gaza City occupation plan
item.description: BBC correspondent Emir Nader speaks to demonstrators against the Israel's plans for Gaza, including a former soldier who says he no longer supports th...

item.title: How Kentucky bourbon went from boom to bust
item.description: Tariffs, oversupply and teetotaling Gen-Zs have all contributed to the downfall of one of America's most iconic liquors.
